[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation_event.rs] [Function: old_uri()] [URI consistency] Is there validation that old_uri matches the actual previous URI stored on-chain, or can attackers emit events with arbitrary old_uri values rewriting history? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation_event.rs] [Trait: MoveEventV1Type] [Resource model violation] Can UriMutationEvent be inappropriately used as a Move resource type instead of just an event type, breaking Move's resource safety guarantees? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation_event.rs] [Function: collection()] [Database injection] Can collection names with SQL special characters cause injection vulnerabilities in indexer databases that don't properly parameterize queries? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation_event.rs] [Function: try_from_bytes()] [Partial bytes] Can incomplete BCS bytes cause try_from_bytes() to return partial events or undefined behavior where some fields are uninitialized? (High)
